Title: Public Service Homicide
Plot: When Carl Mullaly is discovered murdered in his apartment, Green and Cassady learn that he had recently been profiled on HardFocus, a tabloid talk show that exposes sex offenders who are caught via the ScumWatch website. With an eight-year-old girl as the only eye witness, detectives arrest the murderer, but McCoy and Rubirosa soon learn that HardFocus is a lot more involved than they claim.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Karl Herlinger, Scott Chan, A.J. Handegard, Gary Lindemann, Jones Miller, Will Pailen, Jimmy Smagula, Steve Routman, Andres Munar, Andre Holland, Edwina Findley, Lynne Faljian Taylor, Tobias Segal, Juliet Pritner
